HOW DESIGN CAN HELP YOUR BUSINESS

March 23, 2024
6 min

Every business needs a brand. Good design can help grow a business in many ways and this contribution can be a critical factor in a company's success. The marketing indicator is brand recognition which is achieved through a bright and distinctive design. In addition, design can improve the financial indicators of a business, which is a positive consequence for it. There are a few ways design can have a beneficial effect for business:

1. Building brand and awareness

A unique design can help a brand stand out from the crowd, establish recognizability and create a positive impression for potential customers. Brand's visual identity such as a logo, colors, typography, print and digital design can be key attention factors for a product or service.

2. Building brand and awareness

A unique design can help a brand stand out from the crowd, establish recognizability and create a positive impression for potential customers. Brand's visual identity such as a logo, colors, typography, print and digital design can be key attention factors for a product or service.

3. Building brand and awareness

6. Building brand and awareness

7. Building brand and awareness

only 6 steps of working process

Consultation

We target the main goals of the project, clarify the brief, figure out exact budget and deadlines.

Step #1

Test Slides

I create 2-3 test slides for approval by style, colors and overall composition.

Step #2

Feedback

We include edits to the test design based on your comments until the style is fully approved.

Step #3

Design

I continue to work on the remaining slides according to the previously approved style.

Step #4

Feedback #2

We include edits design based on your comments until the pitch deck is fully approved.

Step #5

Delivery

I ship all source files and additional graphics of the project.

Step #6
book a free consultation
